name: 2025 Recap - Zed — Love your editor again
snippet:
Zed Gets Agentic   A complete overhaul of Zed's agent panel, including bespoke features like multibuffer review and agent following.
After countless requests, a freshly written rendering backend, and much more, Zed is available on Windows. Zed is a high-performance, multiplayer code editor from the creators of Atom and Tree-sitter.

name: Zed — Love your editor again
snippet: Zed is a minimal code editor crafted for speed and collaboration with humans and AI. Written from scratch in Rust to efficiently leverage multiple CPU cores ...

name: The Fastest AI Code Editor — Zed's Blog
snippet: 7 May 2025 — The entire Zed code editor is open source under GPL version 3, and scratch-built in Rust all the way down to handcrafted GPU shaders and OS graphics API calls.

name: Is zed performance a lie [rant] : r/ZedEditor
snippet: Zed's claim is not about being more efficient, but about being able to squeeze out more performance from your hardware.
